9e39c13f-51a5-4017-935e-ab029132102a: Radiance grants the wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 5 + the wielders's {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g}.
ce11f09d-cd37-4aa9-8bcb-548496aa0146:
This weapon is a +4 cold iron longsword. In the hand of a paladin or a {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} mythic creature it becomes a Holy Avenger. This sacred weapon provides {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} of 5 + the wielder's {g|Encyclopedia:Class_Level}class level{/g} to the wielder and anyone adjacent to her. It also enables the wielder to use {g|SpellsGreaterDispelMagic}greater dispel magic{/g} (once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}) at the class level of the wielder. Only the area dispel is possible, not the {g|SpellsGreaterDispelMagicTarget}targeted dispel{/g} or counterspell versions of greater dispel magic.
Holy: A holy weapon is imbued with holy power. This power makes the weapon good-aligned and thus bypasses the corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}. It deals an extra {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} against all creatures of evil alignment.
